entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:33 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
